document.full_text: the international community started to send disaster relief teams on saturday to help japan after it suffered a massive earthquake and tsunami, with the united nations sending a group to help co-ordinate work.
document.title: world sends disaster relief teams to japan
lines_and_colors: the international community started to send disaster relief teams on saturday to help japan after it suffered a massive earthquake and tsunami, with the united nations sending a group to help co-ordinate work.
